text: int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int recurse ( int row ) { int i = row - 1 , j , sum = 0 ; while ( i > 0 ) { for ( j = row ; j >= 1 ; j -- ) { sum = 0 ; sum = arr [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] + arr [ i ] [ j ] ; if ( sum < ( arr [ i ] [ j - 1 ] + arr [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ) ) { sum = ( arr [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] + arr [ i ] [ j - 1 ] ) ; } arr [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] = sum ; } i -- ; } arr [ i ] [ j ] = sum ; return sum ; } int main ( ) { int i , j , k , n , n1 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n1 ) ; while ( n1 -- && n1 <= 99 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } printf ( "\n %d" , recurse ( n ) ) ; } return 0 ; }
